ingredients.ingredient: ¾ cup sauerkraut, drained and squeezed dry
⅓ cup thousand island salad dressing
1 (8 ounce) tube refrigerated crescent rolls (such as Pillsbury®)
¾ pound thin-sliced cooked corned beef

cookingTips: Squeeze sauerkraut very dry to prevent the pastry from becoming soggy
Spread filling on dough before rolling to ensure even distribution
Brush with egg white for a shiny, golden-brown finish
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How do we keep the crescent pastry crispy when it contains a wet filling like sauerkraut?
